metadata.dc:author: Pérez de la Cruz, J M
Roca Llop, J
metadata.dc:description: An infant with a congenital brain arteriovenous shunt and secondary aneurism of Galen vein is related. Abnormal electrocardiogram without physical signs of primary cardiopathy is observed. Complete description of the case is done and the problems originated from a cardiological point of view are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Fístula arteriovenosa cerebral.
[Congenital brain arteriovenous shunt. cardiological aspects (author's transl)].
